title: Who wants to sell or trade me a T213-3?
author: lug-nut

posts.post_title: Who wants to sell or trade me a T213-3?
posts.post_content:
Looking specifically for a presentable PSA 1.5 non HOFer to match my PSA 1.5 type 1 & 2.

I have a handful of T206 to trade or I can buy your nicely priced card outright.

Lemme know!

I wish I saw this two weeks ago. I have one in Sterling right now (a frank chance). Here is a link. Good luck otherwise. Type 3s are tough

[url]https://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/mobile/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=72896[/url]
